tool_description:
Topic modelling for News. 

This API detects the topic of an given news, by categories: Business, Cars, Entertainment, Family, Health, Politics, Religion, Science, Sports, Technology, Travel, World, Games, Relationship
name: News Classification
title: News Classification

api_list.name: News Topic Modelling
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-classification.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-classification.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
